pros: Soft cushion for easy days; No break-in period needed; Outsole is grippy and durable; Supports moderately flat feet; Roomy toebox; Perfect for beginners; Budget-friendly
cons: Not for narrow feet; Lacks responsiveness; Toebox durability leaves much to be desired
RR_verdict: Among ASICS' long-standing series, the thirteenth version of the ASICS Gel Pulse makes our daily runs a spa for our feet. It's plush and supportive; we observed that going the distance is an easy feat with the Gel Pulse 13. Even more, it's an affordable option that delivers all-around performance whether it's in running, walking, or gym training.
use: Jogging |, Treadmill |, Walking |, All-day wear |, For beginners
